Package client

Class UserPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.UserPreferences
  • public class UserPreferences
extends java.lang.Object
    UserPreferences is a layer over Preferences to get/set our application settings.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      UserPreferences()

      Returns the FX volume
      double getMusicVolume()
      Returns the music volume

      Checks if the application is in colorblind mode.

      Check if sound is muted.
      void setColorblind​(boolean colorblind)
      Sets the color blind settings in preferences
      void setFxVolume​(double volume)
      Sets the FX volume This value should be between 0.0 and 0.6
      void setMusicVolume​(double volume)
      Sets the music volume This value should be between 0.0 and 1.0

      Sets the sound muted setting in preferences.

    • Method Detail

      • setColorblind

        public void setColorblind​(boolean colorblind)
        Sets the color blind settings in preferences
        Parameters:
        colorblind - true if the application should be in colorblind mode

      • isSoundMuted

        public boolean isSoundMuted()
        Check if sound is muted.
        Returns:
        true if the sound is muted, false if not or when the value is not set.

      • setSoundMuted

        public void setSoundMuted​(boolean muted)
        Sets the sound muted setting in preferences.
        Parameters:
        muted - true if the application should mute sound.

      • isColorBlind

        public boolean isColorBlind()
        Checks if the application is in colorblind mode.
        Returns:
        true if colorblind mode is on, false if not or when the value is not set.

      • getMusicVolume

        public double getMusicVolume()
        Returns the music volume
        Returns:
        the music volume, or 0.5 by default when the key is not set

      • setMusicVolume

        public void setMusicVolume​(double volume)
        Sets the music volume This value should be between 0.0 and 1.0
        Parameters:
        volume - the volume for music

      • getFxVolume

        public double getFxVolume()
        Returns the FX volume
        Returns:
        the fx volume, or 0.3 by default when the key is not set

      • setFxVolume

        public void setFxVolume​(double volume)
        Sets the FX volume This value should be between 0.0 and 0.6
        Parameters:
        volume - the volume for sound FX
